Search Device Searching for device.... binding... No device found Pair success Your exercise and health data will be synchronized between the watch and the phone through the APP. Finish Understand Wear Tip In order to accurately measure data and not affect the normal use of APP, please try to wear the watch 1cm away from the wrist bone Remove the device, charge it to activate, and hold it close to the phone Please select your watch by MAC address Search Again You can perform the following operations and try again: · Turn on the bluetooth of the phone again \n· Make sure that the watch is turned on and close to the phone \ N · Click on the device \" Restore factory Settings \" Later, it is not bound Can\'t find the device to add?
